recordType.name: EAP Prod Request
recordType.a:description: All Request Record For Production Support Site
recordType.a:listViewTemplateExpr: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordGridLayoutColumns"( columns: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridLayoutColumn"( label: "Request Id", width: "DISTRIBUTE", field: "requestId", align: "RIGHT", component: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordGrid_linkField"( links: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordLink"( label: rf!requestId, recordtype: rp!type, identifier: rp!id ) }, align: "RIGHT" ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridLayoutColumn"( label: "Process Name", width: "DISTRIBUTE", field: "processId", align: "LEFT", component: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordGrid_textField"( displayvalue: index(#"_a-0000e4c3-ab68-8000-5250-1bef901bef90_12194"( processId:rf!processId ),"name",{}) ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridLayoutColumn"( label: "Status", width: "DISTRIBUTE", field: "requestCurrStatus", align: "LEFT", component: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordGrid_textField"( displayvalue: index(#"_a-0000e4c3-ab68-8000-5250-1bef901bef90_7827"( code: rf!requestCurrStatus ),"label",{}), align: "LEFT" ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridLayoutColumn"( label: "Maker", width: "DISTRIBUTE", align: "LEFT", component: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordGrid_textField"( displayvalue: a!localVariables( local!allUsers: getallusers( 1, - 1 ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"( items: rf!makerId, expression: if( contains( local!allUsers, touser(fv!item) ), concat( user( fv!item, "firstName" ), " ", user( fv!item, "lastName" ) ), fv!item ) ) ), align: "LEFT" ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridLayoutColumn"( label: "Checker", width: "DISTRIBUTE", align: "LEFT", component: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordGrid_textField"( displayvalue: a!localVariables( local!allUsers: getallusers( 1, - 1 ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"( items: rf!checkerId, expression: if( contains( local!allUsers, touser(fv!item) ), concat( user( fv!item, "firstName" ), " ", user( fv!item, "lastName" ) ), fv!item ) ) ), align: "LEFT" ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridLayoutColumn"( label: "Is Adhoc Trigger", width: "DISTRIBUTE", field: "isAdhocTrigger", align: "CENTER", component: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordGrid_richTextDisplayField"( align: "CENTER", value: { if( rf!isAdhocTrigger = 1, #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"( icon: "check-circle", color: "POSITIVE", size: "MEDIUM" ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"( icon: "times-circle", color: "NEGATIVE", size: "MEDIUM" ) ) } ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridLayoutColumn"( label: "Updated On", width: "DISTRIBUTE", field: "updatedOn", align: "LEFT", component: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordGrid_dateTimeField"( displayvalue: rf!updatedOn ) ) }, pageSize: 50, defaultSort: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"( field: "requestId", ascending: false ), shadeAlternateRows: true )

a:fieldCfg.name: WorkFlow
a:fieldCfg.a:facetExpr:
